generated_doNotEdit.title: Owner Hurt By Target Behavior
generated_doNotEdit.description: Allows the mob to target another mob that hurts their owner.

fields.title: Entity Types
fields.description: List of entity types that this mob can target if they hurt their owner

subForm.description: List of entity types that this mob can target if they hurt their owner

fields.title: Cooldown
fields.description: The amount of time in seconds that the mob has to wait before selecting a target of the same type again

fields.title: Filters
fields.description: Conditions that make this entry in the list valid

fields.title: Max Dist
fields.description: Maximum distance this mob can be away to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See
fields.description: If true, the mob has to be visible to be a valid choice

fields.title: Must See Forget Duration
fields.description: Determines the amount of time in seconds that this mob will look for a target before forgetting about it and looking for a new one when the target isn't visible any more

fields.title: Reevaluate Description
fields.description: If true, the mob will stop being targeted if it stops meeting any conditions.

fields.title: Sprint Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the running speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Walk Speed Multiplier
fields.description: Multiplier for the walking speed. A value of 1.0 means the speed is unchanged

fields.title: Priority
fields.description: As priority approaches 0, the priority is increased. The higher the priority, the sooner this behavior will be executed as a goal.
